name: Fractured Harry Potter Book 6--Part B Quiz | Brain Teasers | 15 Questions

questions.text: Purr fez sore hoar rusts lug harm?
questions.explanation:
Professor Horace Slughorn.

	In Harry's sixth year, Professor Slughorn is Hogwarts' Potions Master. He gathers around him students whom he considers promising (and likely to do Slughorn good in later life). When Snape flees, Slughorn becomes the new Head of Slytherin House.

Room of Requirement.

	This is the disappearing room in which Dumbledore's Army met in Book 5. In Book 6, Malfoy uses the Room to create a secret passageway between Borgin and Burkes shop and Hogwarts. This is the entranceway that the Death Eaters use.

Felix Felicis.

	Harry wins this lucky potion by excelling in Slughorn's class. He uses the potion to induce Slughorn to give up a memory about Tom Riddle and horcruxes. Also due to Felix Felicis, Ginny breaks up with Dean, an event that Harry welcomes with delight.

Percy Weasley.

	"I don't want none of your weevily wheatI don't want none of your barley,I want some flour and half an hourTo bake a cake for Charlie!"

Seven Horcruxes.

	Voldemort's seven horcruxes include the bit of his soul that still resides within him, Slytherin's locket, Tom Riddle's diary, Hufflepuff's golden cup, Nagini the snake, Marvolo's Gaunt's ring, and (probably) something belonging to either Ravenclaw or Gryffindor.

Wilkie Twycross.

	Twycross is the Ministry wizard who teaches eligible students to Apparate.

questions.correct: Marauders map & Marauders' map & Marauder's map
questions.explanation:
Marauders map & Marauders' map & Marauder's map.

	Harry uses the map, which once belonged to his father, to locate Draco, but when Draco goes into the Room of Requirement, he disappears from the map.

Madam Rosmerta & Madame Rosmerta.

	The beautiful Madam Rosmerta, landlady of the Three Broomsticks pub in Hogsmeade, falls under Draco Malfoy's Imperius Curse and helps the evil student smuggle poisoned wine into Hogwarts. Madam Rosmerta also has a role in passing the cursed opal necklace to Katie Bell.

Tom Riddle.

	Tom (Jr.) is of course the young Lord Voldemort, son of downtrodden Merope Gaunt (Marvolo's daughter) and wealthy, handsome Tom Riddle, a Muggle.

Romilda Vane.

	Hoping to date Harry, pretty Romilda gives him chocolate cauldrons laced with love potion. But Ron ends up eating the cauldrons, thinking they are one of his birthday presents.

Slytherins locket & Slytherin's locket.

	Merope Gaunt Riddle sells the locket, her only treasure, before her son Tom is born. By foul means, Tom retrieves the family heirloom and makes it into a Horcrux. When Harry and Dumbledore try to find and destroy the locket, Harry learns that a mysterious person called R.A.B. has beaten them to the punch.

Aragog.

	Hagrid's dear friend the gigantic spider king passes away in Book 6. Harry and Professor Slughorn attend the creature's funeral, along with the grief-stricken Hagrid.

questions.explanation:
Molly and Arthur Weasley.

	Parents of the seven Weasley children, Molly and Arthur have been in love since they were teens at Hogwarts.

Harry and Ginny.

	Finally, Harry and Ginny get together--only to break up due to Harry's fear that Voldemort will use Ginny to get to Harry.
